legal_basis: Section 96 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
credibility_findings: no credible evidence linking fear to persecution based on race
reasonableness_standard: Board's decision was reasonable under the standard of review
risk_of_persecution: applicant claimed persecution in Sri Lanka due to Tamil ethnicity
evidence_assessment: encounters with authorities did not indicate LTTE affiliation, post-war extortion unrelated to race or political opinion
decision_outcome: application for judicial review dismissed, Board's decision upheld
nexus_to_convention_grounds: no linkage to Convention grounds established
review_standard: Federal Court reviewed under reasonableness standard
